attributes.action: Tell the Government to hand over our waters in March2019 and not 2020
attributes.additional_details: We have lost control of our fishing rights as far back as 1973 we have now won the rights to take back our waters so let us do it sooner rather then later.
attributes.background: The Government must give our fishermen the right to get back their livelihoods in 2019 and not 2020. It will be UK waters and not EU or foreign fishermen's waters from March2019.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/201145
